#summary Conservation Traits
#labels TERMS

= Conservation Traits =

Stephane Riviere of the ENSCONET [http://www.ensconet.eu/] has proposed to add these terms for information on conservation traits [http://www.nordgen.org/epgris3/wiki/index.php/Talk:DwC_Germplasm on the EPGRIS3 Wiki]. 

    * *[IUCNCategory]*
    * *NumberOfSeeds*
    * *BioRegion*
    * *InSituCountry*
    * *InSituRecoveryDateStarted*
    * *InSituRecoveryInstitute*
    * *InSituRecoveryRemarks*
